title: Cup And Saucer, mid-18th century
markings: underglaze blue: double crossed swords; incised underglaze on cup: "4" (see card)
dimensions:
a)H: 4.7 x W: 8 x L: 9.8 cm
b) H: 3 x D: 13.5 cm
description: Cup with simple loop handle; saucer deep, with curved sides.  Inside of cup and saucer white, with scattered flowers; outside of cup and underside of rim of saucer yellw, with white reserve panels, on cup, in which are flowers.  Edges of cup and saucer brown.

tombstone.epitaph:
Cup And Saucer, mid-18th century.
mid-18th century. porcelain. Gift of Mrs. Edward Luckemeyer. 1912-13-13-a,b.
